channel.title: My range aint working can someone help? [508]
channel.description:
hey guys! all the problem is that my range dosnt work on npc's/players the only range weapon that works is a magic short bow :l i have tryed google'ing for tut's and been on endless forums searching i now i am getting a headach! so if anyone can post me some codes and simply tut on where to put it all that would be great! :D (am new to codeing so i don't know alot)
thanks brett

item.title: My range aint working can someone help? [508]
item.dc:creator: @BR3TT_077 BR3TT 077
item.description:
@BR3TT_077 wrote:

thanks guys for the post and if this makes a diffrence then it’s a berkey based source [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 01:15:02 pm[/size][hr]erm where should i be looking for all this “zyle1992”? thanks for help me out as well ;D
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 01:38:23 pm[/size][hr]ok i think i get this!!! i go into my server? and find where the magic shortbow codes are at and then copy the boolean things and add it to all the other range weapons!!???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 04:17:42 pm[/size][hr]i found this so far!

public static boolean UsingABow(int bow) {
    for (int i = 0; i < Bows.length; i++) {
        if (bow == Bows[i]) {
            return true;

is this anygood?

boolean UseBow = false;

if(hasBow())
UseBow = true;

Yeah, add a boolean for hasBow().

item.title: My range aint working can someone help? [508]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

@BR3TT Search for the Magic Shortbow’s Item ID(or name), an there should be something under the process boolean. Take a look at that code, and the rest should be easy to finish. If not, post the code here and I’ll see what I can do.
